LanguageData.FremenEarlyTech.label: fremen tech
LanguageData.FremenEarlyTech.description: Learned ways of the Fremen. Adept at development of technology utilized from the scavenged parts of other technology. Firearms, Crysknife, and the Stillsuit.
LanguageData.FremenMidTech.label: fremen mid tech
LanguageData.FremenMidTech.description: Learned ways of the Fremen. Improvements of the stillsuit including the mask, and sufficient knowledge to develop the basic spice refinery.
